channel.title: WhiteEye useful end-game?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "WhiteEye useful end-game?"

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded: Well, apparently the reason that McMasters nerfed Jonin and Sanin bloodline abilities is because of that one extra level that WhiteEye Jonin got.

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded:
Yay, I don't feel so bad taking white eye anymore :P

And at the moment the only big thing I use EDUT is for finding allies…drives me nuts getting their mission and NOT getting them >_<

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded: Eight Trigrams Eleventy Billion Palms is pretty good too, and it makes getting some of the themes (I'm looking at you, Floating on Air and All Together Now) much/ easier.

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded: An +4 levels at Jonin are not something to sneeze at. Plus Chakra free Gentle Fist jutsu is nice thing.

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded:
yep, I have gotten the lottery so many times with W.E.

Do not underestimate it. There are times where it may seem pointless but then something new comes along….

item.title: Re: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded:
Genjutsu reaper missions. If you don't know what I'm talking about, you're obviously very poor. :3
WhiteEye can be used to get more ryo drops from reaper missions. It'll also help when you try to get the Hollow Leg.
And it's not just one extra ingredient item. If you use jutsu or items that double ingredients pulls, it can be a lot of extras on a rare ingredient day.
EDUT is also a waste of stamina unless you've refined it to half cost or you get to use it for free or something. Spending 10/9/8/7 stamina (the amount you need depends on your items and village upgrades) to charge chakra every time you want to use it is just silly.

item.title: WhiteEye useful end-game?
item.content:encoded: By the time you get to Jonin level and have the chakra recharge high enough to use Epic Pee-o-Matic reliably, is it really worth being WhiteEye anymore? The whole thing for WhiteEye was finding stuff better right? What's left after that cept for a couple bonus levels and 1 extra ingredient item ^^;
